paper_abstract: Cipher-suite negotiation lets parties negotiate the use of the best cryptographic algorithms. A lack of cipher-suite negotiation in DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) introduces several problems. The authors discuss two proposed designs for cipher-suite negotiation in DNSSEC: hop-by-hop and end-to-end.
paper_title: Cipher-Suite Negotiation for DNSSEC: Hop-by-Hop or End-to-End?
